sentences.en: All those mother trees in the garden are exuberant.
sentences.cn: 果园里的那些母树都长得十分茂盛.

sentences.en: But even here the exuberant and barbaric fancy asserted itself.
sentences.cn: 但是即使在这个地方,丰富野蛮的幻想也显示出自己的权威性.

sentences.en: Carrie began to feel that there was something exuberant and unnatural in his manner.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉开始感到他的态度浮夸不自然.

sentences.en: Carrie put out her hand, smiling, if for nothing more than the man's exuberant good - nature.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉笑着伸出手来, 也许只是因为这个男人热情洋溢、一片好心.

sentences.en: Endlessly varied art thou in the exuberant world, Lady of Manifold Magnificence.
sentences.cn: 大千世界里,你无穷无尽地变幻, 华丽多姿的姑娘.

sentences.en: In the midst of the hurrying, exuberant process there came moments of intense sadness.
sentences.cn: 在这意气风发急若狂飚的过程中,不时使人有极度悲哀之感.

sentences.en: So the exuberant young girl with dark hair and blue eyes decided to become a screen actress.
sentences.cn: 因此，这个充满活力的年轻黑发碧眼女孩决定成为一名荧屏演员。

sentences.en: Something in her responded to his extravagance and his exuberant manner.
sentences.cn: 她的内心有什么东西为他的豪放热忱的风度所感染.

sentences.en: South African football fans are among the most exuberant in the world.
sentences.cn: 南非球迷们在世界上时最充满活力的.

sentences.en: The rigid requirement that Chinese townsman improves living condition still exuberant.
sentences.cn: 中国城市居民改善居住条件的刚性需求依然旺盛.

sentences.en: They were exuberant, energetic, and filled with youthful idealism.
sentences.cn: 她们非常有活力 、 精力充沛, 充满年轻人的理想主义.

sentences.en: This is bold and exuberant cooking.
sentences.cn: 这是大胆而又精彩的烹饪。

sentences.en: Twain's sense of humour, like Dickens ', is based on an exuberant appreciation of language.
sentences.cn: 吐温的幽默感同狄更斯的相似, 是植根于对语言的充分鉴识之上的.

sentences.en: We would be back to our historical cycle of exuberant overextension and sulking isolationism.
sentences.cn: 我们就会回到历史上洋洋自得的过份开发和阴郁沉闷的孤立主义时期,从而周而复始下去.

sentences.en: When the two travellers entered the hut, the old couple beamed with genuine exuberant happiness.
sentences.cn: 当宙斯和赫耳墨斯两人进入这个小茅屋时, 老夫妻俩满心欢喜,笑逐颜开.

words.tran_cn: 生气勃勃地；丰富地；繁茂地
繁茂的；生气勃勃的，充溢的

trans.tran_cn: 生气勃勃的，（活力）充沛的，茂盛的，繁茂的，（词藻）过于华丽的，极度的
trans.tran_en: exuberant decorations, patterns etc are exciting and complicated or colourful
